result.eng: This cheese is made on a farm.
result.ga: Déantar an cháis seo ar fheirm
result.orig: Déantar an cháis seo ar fheirm
result.html: Déantar an cháis seo ar fheirmThis cheese is made on a farm.
result.ponchtml: Déantar an ċáis seo ar ḟeirmThis cheese is made on a farm.

result.eng: I was born on a small farm.
result.html: Rugadh mé ar fheirm bheagI was born on a small farm.
result.ponchtml: Rugaḋ mé ar ḟeirm ḃeagI was born on a small farm.

result.html: Tá feirm againneWe have a farm.
result.ponchtml: Tá feirm againneWe have a farm.

result.eng: They remembered the priests going from farm to farm.
result.ga: Ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirm
result.orig: Ba chuimhin leo na sagairt ag dul ó fheirm go feirm

result.ponchtml: Ba ċuiṁin leo na sagairt ag dul ó ḟeirm go feirmThey remembered the priests going from farm to farm.
